# version 1.8.3

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.6)

project(Irrlicht)

set(IRRLICHT_LIBRARY Irrlicht)

if (UNIX)
    if (NOT APPLE)
        find_package(X11)
        set(LIBRARIES ${LIBRARIES} ${X11_LIBRARIES} ${X11_Xxf86vm_LIB})
    endif()
endif()

set(IRRLICHT_INCLUDE_DIR ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/include)
set(IRRLICHT_SOURCE_DIR ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/source/Irrlicht)

include_directories(${IRRLICHT_INCLUDE_DIR})

    ${IRRLICHT_SOURCE_DIR}/CWaterSurfaceSceneNode.cpp
    ${IRRLICHT_SOURCE_DIR}/CWriteFile.cpp
    ${IRRLICHT_SOURCE_DIR}/CXMeshFileLoader.cpp
    ${IRRLICHT_SOURCE_DIR}/CXMLReader.cpp
    ${IRRLICHT_SOURCE_DIR}/CXMLWriter.cpp
    ${IRRLICHT_SOURCE_DIR}/CZBuffer.cpp
    ${IRRLICHT_SOURCE_DIR}/CZipReader.cpp
    ${IRRLICHT_SOURCE_DIR}/IBurningShader.cpp
    ${IRRLICHT_SOURCE_DIR}/Irrlicht.cpp
    ${IRRLICHT_SOURCE_DIR}/irrXML.cpp
    ${IRRLICHT_SOURCE_DIR}/os.cpp
)

set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${SYSCFLAGS} -Izlib -Ijpeglib -Ilibpng -DIRRLICHT_EXPORTS=1 -Wall -pipe -fno-exceptions -fno-rtti -fstrict-aliasing -fexpensive-optimizations -O3 -DPNG_THREAD_UNSAFE_OK -DPNG_NO_MMX_CODE -DPNG_NO_MNG_FEATURES -fPIC")
# set(CMAKE_MODULE_LINKER_FLAGS "${SYSLIBS} -lm")

if(UNIX)
    if(APPLE)
        set(CMAKE_MODULE_LINKER_FLAGS "-L/usr/X11R6/lib${LIBSELECT} -lGL -lXxf86vm")

    else()
    endif()
endif()

add_library(${IRRLICHT_LIBRARY} SHARED ${IRRLICHT_SOURCE_FILES} ${IRRLICHT_INCLUDE_FILES})

install(FILES ${IRRLICHT_INCLUDE_FILES} DESTINATION include/irrlicht)
install(TARGETS ${IRRLICHT_LIBRARY} DESTINATION lib)
install(FILES Irrlicht-config.cmake DESTINATION lib/cmake/irrlicht)
